data.message: Love that track.. Love his humour, truth, realism and the way he can be all sides of his personality through music, so many talentless performers out there, all fake, being a puppet for whichever label, and they don't last. I hope he continues for another decade at least, the mans a legend !! And I'm proud to say I've followed him from his first album, he just keeps evolving, getting better and raising the barr, through adversity comes diversity.

replies.message: Well put.. I've been thru a lot with him.. He's been thru a lot and we have been privileged to go thru it with his music. Every album represents a piece of him.... So glad he's back and better than ever.
Lol he can suck my clit lol
You wish. What has that got to do with the current comments? Go away and play with yourself!
